text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the State Board of Dental Examiners.
"Dental hygienist" means an individual, other than a dentist, who practices dental hygiene.
"Dental laboratory" means any commercial laboratory or workroom in which a person engages in dental laboratory work.
"Dental laboratory work" means making, repairing, or altering a dental appliance extraorally.
"Dentist" means an individual who practices dentistry.

section.section:
"License" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a license issued by the Board to:
Practice dentistry; or
Practice dental hygiene.
"Licensed dental hygienist" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a dental hygienist who is licensed by the Board to practice dental hygiene.
"Licensed dentist" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a dentist who is licensed by the Board to practice dentistry.

text.section: Except as provided in § 4-308(f)(2) of this title, "supervision" means supervision of a dental hygienist by a dentist, where the dentist may or may not be present when the dental hygienist performs the dental hygiene procedures but is available on the premises.

"Temporary dental clinic permit" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a temporary permit issued by the Board to a bona fide charitable organization to provide dental services to the poor, elderly, or disabled at a dental clinic.
